ygData.subject: Re: Char Catillion
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You cannot see your target.   That is the message you will receive. ... As with all of our other wind based songs, the flute is utterly useless unless it s
ygData.messageBody:
> 1. Counters can get in the way. You'll see a failure message (target is
> too far away? target is not visible? not sure, but you'll see one).
> Stand next to him/her.

You cannot see your target. That is the message you will receive.

> 2. It's a wind-based song, it will be better when you can use your flute
> (which you will really only be able to practice when you get underwater
> song).

As with all of our other wind based songs, the flute is utterly
useless unless it's required (invisiblility). Using a flute for
our other songs doesn't do anything. Charm, Pixie, Charisma,
WaterBreathing, no duration improvement, resist lessening, or
statistical adjustment can be noticed. Which is sad, and probably
explains why my Darkwood Piccolo has no stats.

Verant1> Hey, I'm gonna put a flute on Cazic Thule.
Verant2> Ok, cool, is it gonna be like the horn on Vox, or drums on Nag?
Verant1> You mean useful? Since when were flutes useful? <chuckle>
Verant2> <chuckle>

Fill in those people with names like, Gordo, GZ, or Bradboy.
They all fit ;)

Harmonic, who can bash himself 'a revultant verant' if need be.
